            "title": [
              [
                "The benefit of this approach is that you don’t have to clutter controllers and other classes with code to look up values from .resx files. You simply surround text in [[[triple brackets.]]] (The delimiter is configurable.) An "
              ],
              ["HttpModule", [["c"]]],
              [
                " looks for a translation in your .po file to replace the delimited text. If a translation is found, the "
              ],
              ["HttpModule", [["c"]]],
              [
                " substitutes the translation. If no translation is found, it removes the triple brackets and renders the page with the original untranslated text."
              ]
            ]
